MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA3 postcode area of Paisley, We are aware of earlier issues and apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite. And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:40 PM on Thursday, 18 February 2021.
